channel.title: Comments on: Don’t Hate Me Because My Keyboard’s Beautiful

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Would you like that alphabetically? Cuz we could start off with Asshole, swing right into Bastard, CS, Dick and oft-Douchebag, E G O T I S T I C A L, but let's just stop before the "F" listings, because who would have time for all of those? I sure wouldn't.
:)
item.content:encoded:
Would you like that alphabetically? Cuz we could start off with Asshole, swing right into Bastard, CS, Dick and oft-Douchebag, E G O T I S T I C A L, but let’s just stop before the “F” listings, because who would have time for all of those? I sure wouldn’t.

ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: So what are acceptable reasons to hate you then?
item.content:encoded: So what are acceptable reasons to hate you then?

item.title: By: nordee
item.dc:creator: nordee
item.description:
I work at a game development house. We got several of these for review about a year ago. Logitech wanted us to write plugins for our game to display on their keyboard, and was willing to give is "marketing dollars" to do it.
Then, just recently, they pulled the plug on the support program. My guess is that all the publishers and developers realized that it wasn't worth their time to write plugins for the .01% of the people that had the keyboard.
My guess is it will be discontinues within 6 months.
item.content:encoded:
I work at a game development house. We got several of these for review about a year ago. Logitech wanted us to write plugins for our game to display on their keyboard, and was willing to give is “marketing dollars” to do it.

Then, just recently, they pulled the plug on the support program. My guess is that all the publishers and developers realized that it wasn’t worth their time to write plugins for the .01% of the people that had the keyboard.

My guess is it will be discontinues within 6 months.

item.title: By: domain master
item.dc:creator: domain master
item.description: I just got the G-15, it totaly amasing I love it! no more hordes.
item.content:encoded: I just got the G-15, it totaly amasing I love it! no more hordes.

item.title: By: Ardanna
item.dc:creator: Ardanna
item.description:
I've had the G-15 keyboard for quite sometime myself. I really like it - at some point in time WoW actually started making use of it (in that certain stats display on the LCD), but you already know the stuff on the screen, or don't really care about it.
The BIG downside to this keyboard is...the buffer (I think). Whatever the technical word for...if you press shift-up arrow and press space it won't work...is.
I think that's the combination, I'm certain shift up arrow, right arrow and ctrl don't work either.
Essentially, when you start pressing a certain amount of keys, it doesn't get the last key. Very annoying (shift-up space is running jump for me).
item.content:encoded:
I’ve had the G-15 keyboard for quite sometime myself. I really like it – at some point in time WoW actually started making use of it (in that certain stats display on the LCD), but you already know the stuff on the screen, or don’t really care about it.

The BIG downside to this keyboard is…the buffer (I think). Whatever the technical word for…if you press shift-up arrow and press space it won’t work…is.

I think that’s the combination, I’m certain shift up arrow, right arrow and ctrl don’t work either.

Essentially, when you start pressing a certain amount of keys, it doesn’t get the last key. Very annoying (shift-up space is running jump for me).

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: If you really want an xbox...Amazon will be selling 1000 of them for $100 tomorrow morning...
item.content:encoded: If you really want an xbox…Amazon will be selling 1000 of them for $100 tomorrow morning…

item.title: By: gablaxian
item.dc:creator: gablaxian
item.description: i hope you have that keyboard combined with the logitech G7 mouse. i love my G7... *drools*
item.content:encoded: i hope you have that keyboard combined with the logitech G7 mouse. i love my G7… *drools*

item.title: By: unbeliever
item.dc:creator: unbeliever
item.description: Yeah, i was also looking at that keyboard, but instead treated myself to a <a href="http://www.razerzone.com/store/index.php?main_page=product_info&cPath=2_21&products_id=40" rel="nofollow">razor tarantula </a>. The lack of back lit keys is its downfall, but i suppose its the price to pay for its niftyness. Functionality > bling bling lights in my book.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, i was also looking at that keyboard, but instead treated myself to a razor tarantula . The lack of back lit keys is its downfall, but i suppose its the price to pay for its niftyness. Functionality > bling bling lights in my book.

item.title: By: Blachawk
item.dc:creator: Blachawk
item.description: Yeah the G-15 rocks. I used the macro function to pally-buff the entire raid with the press of a single button. It's great for macros that require a time delay.
item.content:encoded: Yeah the G-15 rocks. I used the macro function to pally-buff the entire raid with the press of a single button. It’s great for macros that require a time delay.
